title: In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/War - Historical perspectives
abstract: Ten stories from members of St Arnaud RSL Sub-Branch, in north-western Victoria.
description: While many didn't see active service, these ten veterans from St Anaud count their time in the army as the most important part of their lives. Proud of their service, they tell of exciting adventures, adjusting to big changes and the friends they made along the way.
